body.p: I have now scheduled lectures about my new book
In 12 different cities in the next three months
The first talk, in New York, takes place at the end of March
There will be more Venues in the UK
Europe, and Canada announced very soon.
Here are the cities and dates that have already been booked
Tickets are on sale for my Patreon subscribers
And viewers that signed up to my mailing list
Except from New York, the first show,
Tickets are avaliable to everyone for all cities,
For New York, at the Beacon Theatre
Tickets will be available to everyone as of
Thank you for all your continued support.
I am looking forward to seeing you in the next few months.
